nodes.text: Pergus Frode was a Human male hangar technician employed by the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. Frode served in the hangar of the Sith academy on Odacer-Faustin under the direction of Darth Scabrous. When a virus infected the academy's student body and turned them into flesh-eating monsters, Frode escaped the planet along side Jedi Hestizo Trace.
